issue.title: [CI] Java C Data Interface Integration build failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15949](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15949). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/5557613863

```Java

  Did not find debug/_parquet.cpython-38-x86_64-linux-gnu.so
  Cython module _parquet failure permitted
  Did not find debug/_parquet_encryption.cpython-38-x86_64-linux-gnu.so
  Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pep517/in_process/_in_process.py", line 363, in <module>
      main()
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pep517/in_process/_in_process.py", line 345, in main
      json_out['return_val'] = hook(**hook_input['kwargs'])
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pep517/in_process/_in_process.py", line 261, in build_wheel
      return _build_backend().build_wheel(wheel_directory, config_settings,
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/build_meta.py", line 244, in build_wheel
      return self._build_with_temp_dir(['bdist_wheel'], '.whl',
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/build_meta.py", line 229, in _build_with_temp_dir
      self.run_setup()
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/build_meta.py", line 281, in run_setup
      super(_BuildMetaLegacyBackend,
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/build_meta.py", line 174, in run_setup
      exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'), locals())
    File "setup.py", line 603, in <module>
      setup(
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/__init__.py", line 155, in setup
      return distutils.core.setup(**attrs)
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/core.py", line 148, in setup
      return run_commands(dist)
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/core.py", line 163, in run_commands
      dist.run_commands()
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/dist.py", line 967, in run_commands
      self.run_command(cmd)
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/dist.py", line 986, in run_command
      cmd_obj.run()
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/wheel/bdist_wheel.py", line 299, in run
      self.run_command('build')
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/cmd.py", line 313, in run_command
      self.distribution.run_command(command)
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/dist.py", line 986, in run_command
      cmd_obj.run()
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/command/build.py", line 135, in run
      self.run_command(cmd_name)
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/cmd.py", line 313, in run_command
      self.distribution.run_command(command)
    File "/opt/conda/envs/arrow/lib/python3.8/site-packages/setuptools/_distutils/dist.py", line 986, in run_command
      cmd_obj.run()
    File "setup.py", line 96, in run
      self._run_cmake()
    File "setup.py", line 348, in _run_cmake
      raise RuntimeError('pyarrow C-extension failed to build:',
  RuntimeError: ('pyarrow C-extension failed to build:', '/arrow/python/build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.8/debug/_parquet_encryption.cpython-38-x86_64-linux-gnu.so')
  error: subprocess-exited-with-error
  
  × Building wheel for pyarrow (pyproject.toml) did not run successfully.
  │ exit code: 1
  ╰─> See above for output.
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15949?focusedCommentId=17507785) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12644
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12644>
